concept.definition: Indication that a symptom or condition is subsided or healed.

description: SELECT SNOMED CT and Intermountain Healthcare HDD code system values.
name: HSPC Clinical Assert Status Value Set

text.div:
HSPC Clinical Assert Status Value Set

SELECT SNOMED CT and Intermountain Healthcare HDD code system values.

Copyright Statement: TBD

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/hspc-clinicalassertstatus defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
1797 ResolvedIndication that a symptom or condition is subsided or healed.
69074 ErrorThe state of being mistaken.
